context_bundle.summary: All-in-one Rust reconnaissance toolkit. Replaces: dnsenum, sublist3r, amass, whatweb, nmap (basic), whois. BINARY: X:\mcp-servers\recon-rs\target\release\recon-rs.exe. Modules: DNS, Subdomain, Port Scan (with banner grabbing), Web Fingerprint, WHOIS.

onboarding.quick_start:
SCAN ALL: recon-rs.exe example.com -a
DNS ONLY: recon-rs.exe example.com -d
SUBDOMAINS: recon-rs.exe example.com -s
PORTS: recon-rs.exe example.com -d -p
JSON OUTPUT: recon-rs.exe example.com -a -o json
common_patterns: JSON for parsing: recon-rs.exe domain.com -a -o json

known_errors.cause: DNS not enabled, no IP to scan
known_errors.solution: Add -d flag to enable DNS resolution first
known_errors.prevention: Always use -d with -p for port scanning

known_errors.cause: Verisign server doesn't have data or domain uses privacy
known_errors.solution: Normal for many domains, WHOIS is best-effort
